solutions: Use mock as context manager: with mock_s3():

common_errors.cause: AWS credentials not set for mock
solutions: Use mock_aws decorator which sets credentials

common_errors.cause: AWS service not implemented in Moto
solutions: Check Moto documentation for supported services
File feature request on Moto GitHub

common_errors.cause: DynamoDB table not created in mock
solutions: Ensure mock is started before table creation
Ensure mock is started before boto3 client creation

common_errors.cause: Moto validation stricter than real AWS
solutions: Check parameter values match AWS requirements
File bug if validation is incorrect

common_errors.cause: S3 mock import or activation issue
solutions: For moto 5.x: from moto import mock_aws
Check if using unsupported API version

common_errors.cause: Pytest fixture for moto not defined
solutions: Define fixture with mock context manager
